definitions: (of pop or rock music) performed or recorded with acoustic rather than electrically amplified instruments

examples.text: Rod Stewart's acoustic set spawned an unplugged album that sold three million copies

shortDefinitions: (of pop or rock music) performed or recorded with acoustic rather than electrically amplified instruments

examples.text: he wondered what it would be like to live a more unplugged life
the kids freaked when I told them we were going unplugged for the next month

shortDefinitions: not using electrical or electronic devices
